headline.main: Another Weapon in the Diet Wars

docs.abstract: Editorial says while new diet pill Xenical could become another useful backup weapon in diet wars, primary way to lose weight is to eat sensibly and exercise regularly (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: When it comes to diets, Americans are constantly searching for a quick fix. After all, it is a lot easier for many couch potatoes to pop a pill than to push away that greasy hamburger and french fries or spend 20 minutes on the treadmill. The latest magic bullet is a diet pill called Xenical that can reduce absorption of fat by as much as a third. An advisory committee of the Food and Drug Administration has recommended that the agency approve the pill. It could become another useful backup weapon in the diet wars, but the primary way to lose weight remains, as always, to eat sensibly and exercise regularly.
